FuncDef: This command specifies the template name of the RSVP P2MP LSP instance to be used by the leaf node or the root-and-leaf node that participates in BGP-AD VPLS. The P2MP LSP is referred to as the Inclusive Provider Multicast Service Interface (I-PMSI).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the P2MP LSP template up to 32 characters in length. ParamDefault: Default- None
